HELP_SUPPORT_TEXT1: In the radio stations list, swipe over the entry's right edge to open the slider. Tap on the heart icon to set the selected radio station as your favorite. Your favorite station will then be accessible in the top bar of the view.
ALERT_CONNECTION_MESSAGE: The audio server could not be reached! Please check your data connection or make sure your wireless connection is on and within range!
OPTIONS_SETTINGS_TEXT: Quick access to the device settings: connect to your Bluetooth audio device or change your connection settings.
OPTIONS_DETAILS_ALARM: Set an alarm and wake up to your favorite radio music!
APP_TEXT_MORE:
This app:
* is offered for free!
* contains the complete collection of all radio audio streams broadcasting in Finnish and/or internet radios based in Finland.
* has a simple, lightweight interface.
* is up-to-date and maintained regularly to keep all content fresh.
* is not only intended for a Finnish speaking audience, but also targetting non-Finnish listeners.
* does not collect user data from your device, the only data downloaded are the audio streams.
* does not need special permissions.
* will receive more interesting features in the near future!
ABOUT_TEXT2: This app does not collect any personal data nor statistics, but provides merely an interface to quickly access and listen to internet radio streams.
ALERT_CONNECTION_SUBTITLE: Could not load the audio stream
FEATURED_TEXT: Every month a radio station is brought to the audience's attention. Get familiar with stations you might not know!
OPTIONS_DETAILS_BOOSTER: This setting changes the volume level of the audio stream itself and it has no effect on the volume setting of your device. The recommended setting is 75%. Any music currently playing in the app must be paused and restarted before the change can be applied.
ABOUT_TEXT1: Listen to Finnish radio stations and internet radios! Everything hand-picked and collected into one app!
OPTIONS_DETAILS_SLEEP: Fall asleep undisturbed after listening to music.
GOOGLE_PLAY_APP_TEXT:
The most complete list of Finnish and Finland-based internet radio stations: one single app to have access to all!

StriimiRadio is an app for Android that provides easy access to more than 160 Finnish internet radios and radio streaming channels! It is available in Finnish, English, Swedish, Russian, Estonian and other languages...

The app's intention is simple: direct access to all Finnish internet streams, even the ones you may have never heard of! All hand-picked, checked and added in one handy place.

If you wish to contribute to the localisation of this app in your own language, please leave a note! You will receive eternal gratitude by having your name published as contributor! If you wish to inform of your own internet radio stream, please do, and it will be added to the growing list!
ABOUT_TEXT3: Logo font style by Typodermic Fonts
HELP_SUPPORT_TEXT3: You are also welcome to leave your review, rating and feedback on Google Play!
ABOUT_PAYPALME: The app you have here is the result of many hours of data collection, coding, testing and drinking liters of bad coffee. If you enjoy the app as much as I enjoyed making it, feel free to leave a little donation via PayPal.Me!
HELP_SUPPORT_TEXT2: Ideas, suggestions, improvements, bugs, outdated content or invalid audio streams can be reported here. If you wish to contribute to the translation of this app, please leave a message with your contact information!
